page.title: 10TRANSPORT _ CARS & BUSES
page.content:
Nearly every household in West Horndon has a car ,because public transport is infrequent and expensive. People need a car to go shopping because in West Horndon you do not have the choice of food and it is expensive .There are no clothes shops. Most people also use it for pleasure and transport to work.
There are bus sevices in the area serving West Horndon and Bulphan. Two buses go through West Horndon.They go to Romford,Hornchurch,Upminister, Craham, West Horndon, Laindon and Baisildon and they go every hour.There is a bus to Bulphan a few times a day.
I05120234
